title: Spicy Peanut Chicken
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb boneless skinless chicken breast (cut into chunks)
directions: Whisk together the peanut butter, soy sauce, water, rice vinegar, ginger, garlic, honey, lime juice, and Sriracha to create the peanut dressing. /p Add sesame oil to a skillet over medium heat. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Add a touch of cooking spray to the skillet and cook the chicken for 3-4 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Remove and set aside. /p Add the red onion, red pepper, broccoli, carrots, and edamame. Season with salt and pepper. Add 1/4 cup water and cover. Cook for 3-5 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Drain any remaining water. /p Add back the chicken along with the sauce. Toss everything together and let warm for 2-3 minutes. /p Serving size: 1/6 of total yield , about 2/3 of a cup /p Calories: 297/serving (497/serving with 1 cup of cooked rice)
